sentence.Network_en: We must respond to well-founded criticism with a willingness to change.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于有根有据的批评，我们必须乐意作出改变。

sentence.Network_en: Self-discipline, willingness, enthusiasm, that's what you must depend on.
sentence.Network_cn: 自律、自愿与热情，这是你所必须依仗的。

sentence.Network_en: His presence is indicative of his willingness to help.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的出席表示他愿意帮忙.

entry.def: If someone is willing to do something, they are fairly happy about doing it and will do it if they are asked or required to do it.

example.ex: The military now say they're willing to hold talks with the political parties...
example.tran: 军方现在说，他们愿意与政党进行谈判。

example.ex: There are, of course, questions which she will not be willing to answer.
example.tran: 当然，有些问题是她不愿回答的。

entry.tran: 自愿的;愿意的;积极肯干的
entry.def: Willing is used to describe someone who does something fairly enthusiastically and because they want to do it rather than because they are forced to do it.

example.ex: Have the party on a Saturday, when you can get your partner and other willing adults to help...
example.tran: 把聚会安排在周六，这样你就可以找自己的搭档和其他愿意帮把手的成年人来帮忙了。

example.ex: Although he had had no formal engineering training he was a natural and willing pupil.
example.tran: 虽然他没有接受过正规工科训练，但却是个天生好学的学生。

auth_sentence.content: I get the sense that there is a willingness.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I get the sense that there is a willingness.

auth_sentence.content: Willingness to participate in oceanographic research cruises is mandatory.

auth_sentence.content: The standard would be a willingness and an ability.
auth_sentence.res_content: The standard would be a willingness and an ability.

sentences.en: Workers’ leaders have expressed their willingness to cooperate.
sentences.cn: 工人领袖们表达了合作的意愿。

sentences.en: Ask young Harry to do it—he’s still an eager beaver and wants to impress by his willingness.
sentences.cn: 请年轻的亨利干吧——他仍然是个雄心勃勃的人,并努力使人对他的投入留下深刻印象。
